name: digitally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that records or stores information as a series of the numbers 1 and 0, to show that a signal is present or absent: ISDN can transfer data completely digitally.
in a way that uses or relates to digital signals and computer technology: Sound and pictures can be stored digitally. All outgoing calls will be digitally recorded.
in a way that shows information in the form of an electronic image: Original oil paintings can be reproduced digitally and printed out on canvas via computer. Candlelight isn't conducive to capturing food digitally. See
digital
